An iron gate bearing the infamous slogan "Arbeit macht frei" ("Work will set you free") has been returned to Dachau, the former Nazi death camp, after it was stolen two years ago. The gate, which weighs 100kg (15 stone) was reported missing in November 2014.

Kuwaiti hospital ‘will refuse to treat migrant labourers’. First new public hospital in more than three decades will not treat Gulf state’s huge foreign-born worker population in latest step targeting foreigners
